verses.name: Judges 9:42
verses.text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that the people went out into the field; and they told Abimelech.

verses.name: Judges 9:43
verses.text: And he took the people, and divided them into three companies, and laid wait in the field, and looked, and, behold, the people were come forth out of the city; and he rose up against them, and smote them.

verses.name: Judges 9:44
verses.text: And Abimelech, and the company that was with him, rushed forward, and stood in the entering of the gate of the city: and the two other companies ran upon all the people that were in the fields, and slew them.
